entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3 except zero near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3 except zero near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
